title: Maximum Subarray Sum
description:
Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of any contiguous subarray.

Input Format:
- First line contains n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5), the size of the array
- Second line contains n space-separated integers (-10^9 ≤ a[i] ≤ 10^9)

Output Format:
- Print a single integer: the maximum subarray sum

Example:
Input:
5
-2 1 -3 4 -1

Output:
4

Explanation: The subarray [4] has the maximum sum of 4.
